name: 马克斯·玻恩
bio_short: 德国物理学家，量子力学的奠基人之一。他提出了波函数的“概率诠释”（玻恩定则 `born_wavefunction_1926`），并发展了“玻恩-奥本海默近似” (`born_oppenheimer_approximation_1927`)，因此获得了1954年的诺贝尔物理学奖。
bio_short_en: A German physicist and a foundational figure in quantum mechanics. He established the 'Born rule' (`born_wavefunction_1926`, the probabilistic interpretation of the wavefunction) and co-developed the 'Born-Oppenheimer approximation' (`born_oppenheimer_approximation_1927`), winning the Nobel Prize in 1954.
